description: This file defines API routes for managing 'test scripts' in a FastAPI application, including CRUD operations such as create, read, update, and delete. It primarily handles HTTP request routing and response formatting, relying on external services and schemas.

methods.name: create_test( test_data: TestScriptCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new test script.

methods.name: list_tests( page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all test scripts with pagination.

methods.name: get_test( test_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve details of a specific test script by ID.

methods.name: update_test( test_id: str, test_data: TestScriptUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update an existing test script.

methods.name: delete_test( test_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a test script.

ctags.name: create_test
ctags.signature: ( test_data: TestScriptCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: delete_test
ctags.signature: ( test_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: get_test
ctags.signature: ( test_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: list_tests
ctags.signature: ( page: int = Query(1, ge=1), page_size: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100), db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: update_test
ctags.signature: ( test_id: str, test_data: TestScriptUpdate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current_user: dict = Depends(get_current_user) )
